name: Way to Die!
description:
Way to die is a turn-based strategy adventure game where you play as a die. Roll different directions to execute different moves and attacks. Slay all the chess pieces before they slay you!

All assets made within 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam! (except:)

To play: download and unzip/extract the files then run "2022 GMTK Game Jam"

freesound.org (CC0)

> Day Time Amb

> Fire Crackle and Flames 002
